defmodule Solution do
  @spec count_k_subsequences_with_max_beauty(s :: String.t, k :: integer) :: integer do
    s
    |> String.graphemes()
    |> Enum.frequencies()
    |> Enum.map(fn {_, v} -> v end)
    |> Enum.sort(&>=/2)
    |> Enum.take(k)
    |> Enum.reduce(0, fn x, acc -> acc + x end)
    |> (&(&1 * comb(Enum.count(s) - k, k))).()
    |> rem(1_000_000_007)
  end

  defp comb(n, k) do
    Enum.reduce(1..k, 1, fn i, acc ->
      div(acc * (n - k + i), i)
    end)
  end
end
